--------------------------------------------------------------

Since ancient times, stories of epic battles and mythical legends have been passed through generations in the mysterious and rugged mountainous region of Scotland. In Brave, a new tale joins the lore when the courageous Merida (voice of Kelly Macdonald) confronts tradition, destiny and the fiercest monsters. Merida is a skilled archer and impetuous daughter of King Fergus (voice of Billy Connolly) and Queen Elinor (voice of Emma Thompson). Determined to carve your own path, it defies an ancient custom held sacred by noisy lords of the land: the imposing Lord MacGuffin (voice of Kevin McKidd), the surly Lord Macintosh (voice of Craig Ferguson) and the evil Lord Dingwall (voice of Robbie Coltrane ). Involuntarily, acts of Merida trigger chaos and fury in the kingdom, and when she turns to an old witch (voice of Julie Walters) for help, Merida has an evil desire blessed granted. The dangers resulting force her to discover the meaning of true bravery in order to undo the brutal course of events before it is too late.
